amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the authority of local educational agencies to transfer funds between programs from 50 percent to 75 percent upon state approval.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 107-69 to increase the 50% transferability cap for local educational agencies to 75% upon approval from the state.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 137).
